# Feature Pull Request

## Summary
Provide a concise overview of the new feature. Explain the purpose, the problem it solves, and the expected behaviour.

## Scope of Work
List the key implementation items delivered in this PR.
- Backend / API changes
- New endpoints, domain logic, or event flows
- UI components (if applicable)
- Database or schema updates
- Dependency additions or configuration changes

## Technical Details
Describe the important implementation decisions.
- Architecture approach (DDD, Hexagonal, Kafka events, etc.)
- New modules, adapters, or ports introduced
- Design constraints or trade-offs
- Any breaking change considerations

## Screenshots / Evidence (if applicable)
Attach images or recordings that help reviewers understand the new feature.

## Testing
Explain how the feature was tested.
- Unit tests
- Integration tests
- Local environment workflow
- Edge cases validated

## Checklist
- [ ] Code compiles and passes tests
- [ ] API/Domain changes follow established conventions
- [ ] No breaking changes without documentation
- [ ] Updated test cases or added new ones
- [ ] Updated relevant documentation (API docs, diagrams, ERD if needed)
